narrative.narrative: Megantara Air was a cargo airline from May 2007 to May 2009 and was a subsidiary of Kuala Lumpur,Malaysia based Transmile Air Services, and was based at Jakarta,Indonesia. Transmile still has a subsidiary based in Bankok,Thailand called K-Mile Air. Mengantara's main route was to Singapore and it also did charters. At the end it had a 737-200 and a 727-200, both of which were owned by the parent.
